title: The Don't Ask Me About It License
description: Do what you want, just don't contact the author.

cannot.title: Contact Author
cannot.description: Describes your ability to contact the author about the module you're using.

can.title: Modify
can.description: Describes the ability to modify the software and create derivatives.

can.title: Distribute
can.description: Describes the ability to distribute original or modified (derivative) works.

can.title: Commercial Use
can.description: Describes the ability to use the software for commercial purposes.

can.title: Private Use
can.description: Describes the ability to use/modify software freely without distributing it.

fulltext: Copying and distribution of this file, with or without modification, are permitted in any medium provided you do not contact the author about the file or any problems you are having with the file.
